channel.title: Opencv on Alex Pliutau
channel.description: Recent content in Opencv on Alex Pliutau

item.title: Face Detection in Go using OpenCV and MachineBox
item.description: This is a text version of this video: packagemain #5: Face Detection in Go using OpenCV and MachineBox. I found a very nice developer-friendly project MachineBox, which provides some machine learning tools inside Docker Container, including face detection, natural language understanding and few more. And it has SDK in Go, so we will build a program which will detect my face. We will also use OpenCV to capture video from Web camera, it also has Go bindings.
